snippet: With his potential to make a majority on Capitol Hill, Angus King, a former governor of Maine, is trying to redefine the partisan fray.
abstract: Former Maine Gov Angus King is mounting a widely popular independent campaign for the Senate seat being vacated by moderate Republican Olympia J Snowe; if elected, King's support could decide which party controls the evenly divided Senate.
lead_paragraph: With his potential to make a majority on Capitol Hill, Angus King, a former governor of Maine, is trying to redefine the partisan fray.

headline.seo: Senate Control Could Hinge on Angus King of Maine
headline.main: Independent Senate Run in Maine Puts Parties in a Pinch
headline.print_headline: Independent Run For Senate Puts Parties in a Pinch
